channel.desc: Whether its sports, esports, UCI, Ironman, F1, WRC, TV, music, festivals, films or videos, Red Bull TV has it all!

programme.title: Driving Dirty
programme.desc: The months, even years, of preparation have led up to this moment. Now, all that stands between the five teams and their goal is 1,350km (840 miles) of punishing desert driving, where anything can happen.
programme.series-desc: The preparation's done. All that now stands between the teams and their goal is 1,350km (840 miles) of desert.

programme.title: The Signal Hill Speed Run
programme.desc: A ridiculously steep hill in California was the stage for downhill skateboarding's first contest and it quickly became the epicentre of the absurd new sport. The Signal Hill Speed Run was a festival of innovation, speed and danger.
programme.series-desc: The contest that established downhill skateboarding was a festival of speed, partying and danger.

programme.title: 21Days
programme.desc: Go inside the lives of four Hawaiians and Pipe specialists in the weeks leading up to the Volcom Pipe Pro, the biggest event on the North Shore outside of the Triple Crown and a chance to win bragging rights at the world's most dangerous wave.
programme.series-desc: Go inside the lives of four Hawaiians and Pipe specialists in the weeks leading up to Volcom Pipe Pro.

programme.title: 21Days
programme.desc: The four Hawaiians and Pipe specialists revisit the past and discuss how their formative years set them on a path to a career as a pro surfer.
programme.series-desc: The four Hawaiians and Pipe specialists discuss how their childhood shaped their love of surfing.

programme.title: Wingmen
programme.desc: Three of the world's best wingsuit flyers set out on a global journey in search of perfect spots for proximity flying and BASE jumps. From Brazil to China, the trio face some of the most thrilling and challenging flights of their lives.
programme.series-desc: Three elite BASE jumpers face the unknown on a global journey to find the best wingsuit and BASE jump spots.

programme.title: Bullit: The Documentary
programme.desc: Researcher and scientist Dr Dean Miller and his crew embark on a five-day expedition to document and study the reclusive Dwarf Minke whale, a rare creature that makes a brief annual appearance at Australia's Great Barrier Reef.
programme.series-desc: Dr Dean Miller and his research crew embark on a five-day expedition to study the elusive Dwarf Minke whale.

programme.title: Bullit: The Documentary
programme.desc: Chantal Sutherland is one of the few female jockeys in horse racing. Accompany her to the legendary Del Mar racetrack in San Diego, California, as she meets the owners, trainers, and agents who can help her make an international name for herself.
programme.series-desc: At the Del Mar racetrack in San Diego, California, meet one of the few female jockeys in pro horse racing.

programme.title: Chasing El Niño
programme.desc: Chris Benchetler skis his home slopes at Mammoth Mountain in California, USA and the surrounding backcountry, exploring areas of the Sierra Nevada that have been inaccessible for years due to severe drought.
programme.series-desc: Chris Benchetler skis his home slopes in California, USA, exploring previously unreachable areas.

programme.title: Chasing El Niño
programme.sub-title: It's Always Cloudy in British Columbia
programme.desc: Chris Benchetler heads to British Columbia in search of choice snow on Canada's steep terrain, but a long spell of wet conditions and zero visibility threatens the crew’s dream of skiing perfect powder under clear skies.
programme.series-desc: Low visibility threatens the crew’s trip to British Columbia, but they’re determined to make the best of it.

programme.title: Deep Dive SE1
programme.desc: World Title winners Orlando Duque, Gary Hunt and Rhiannan Iffland discuss how important it is to stay sharp throughout the season when every event offers different platforms and water conditions.
programme.series-desc: Orlando Duque, Gary Hunt and Rhiannan Iffland discuss how important it is to stay sharp throughout the season.

programme.title: Deep Dive SE2
programme.desc: Finding the perfect take-off is the most important step in creating a good dive. Orlando Duque, Gary Hunt and Rhiannan Iffland share the challenge of finding the placement for a take-off.
programme.series-desc: Finding the perfect take-off is the most important step in creating a good dive.

programme.title: Destination: Dirt
programme.desc: Meet three young and talented American racers as they are thrust into the international Rally Raid racing scene: Seth Quintero, Blade Hildebrand and Mitch Guthrie Jr.
programme.series-desc: Meet three talented young American racers as they are thrust into the Rally Raid racing scene.

programme.title: The White Maze
programme.desc: A pair of freeskiers embark on their own personal 'mission impossible' by attempting to ski the highest peak in Eastern Siberia. Matthias Haunholder and Matthias Mayr will push beyond their limits to conquer this mountain at the edge of the world.
programme.series-desc: It's 'mission impossible' for a pair of freeskiers who attempt to ski the highest peak in Eastern Siberia.

programme.title: Down Days
programme.desc: In Israel, the brothers eat falafel and surf Hilton Beach in Tel Aviv before exploring the four quarters of the Old City in Jersualem and visiting the Separation Wall in the West Bank. Then it's time for surfing in the coastal town of Old Jaffa.
programme.series-desc: In Israel, the brothers explore Jerusalem and surf beaches in both Tel Aviv and the coastal town of Old Jaffa.

programme.title: Let It Play
programme.desc: Jason 'Poo Bear' Boyd is the man responsible for some of pop music’s biggest hits. He went from homeless to hit-maker, but now he must fight to stay relevant while navigating a merciless music industry. Listen to: http://win.gs/Poo-Bear-Playlist
programme.series-desc: From homeless to hit-maker, Poo Bear is the man behind some of pop music’s biggest smash hits.

programme.title: Drift Lamborghini
programme.desc: 'Mad' Mike Whiddett continues his mission to turn a Lamborghini into his dream car by stripping it down in order to build it into a powerful ride. The pressure is on as the deadline approaches.
programme.series-desc: 'Mad' Mike Whiddett begins stripping down the Lamborghini in order to build it into a powerful ride.

programme.title: General Sipes
programme.desc: Ryan Sipes begins his journey through multiple motorcross disciplines. He starts out by racing all three of his unique bikes in Daytona, Florida, at Daytona Bike Week.
programme.series-desc: Ryan Sipes begins his journey through multiple motorcross disciplines at Daytona Bike Week.

programme.title: General Sipes
programme.desc: Ryan Sipes continues to prove his merit inside the stadium before taking on Hard Enduro at Erzberg by racing supercross in Tennessee and Arizona.
programme.series-desc: Ryan Sipes continues to prove his merit inside the stadium by racing in Tennessee and Arizona.

programme.title: Hubertusjagd
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe takes to the country of Georgia to explore the cultural heritage of its beautiful capital city, Tbilisi. Follow along as Hubertus discovers the best spots this growing international destination has to offer.
programme.series-desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe takes to the country of Georgia to explore its beautiful capital city, Tbilisi.

programme.title: Ride to the Roots
programme.desc: Queralt Castellet's earned her place among the best snowboarders in the world, but it took a lot to get there. Get to know Queralt's story and the struggles she's overcome to achieve her dreams of snowboarding.
programme.series-desc: Queralt Castellet has earned her place among the best snowboarders in the world. This is her story.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: No elite-level mountain biker can achieve success without a team behind them to make sure their bike is set up to their personal preference and running the best it can. Meet the mechanics who work with World Cup rookies Kate Courtney and Finn Iles.
programme.series-desc: Meet the mechanics who keep Kate Courtney and Finn Iles's bikes running smoothly.

programme.title: Etnies: Chapters
programme.sub-title: Finding the world's best BMX spots
programme.desc: This team endured countless injuries and dedicated endless hours in search of the most desirable BMX spots in the world to bring you groundbreaking riding captured through the unique perspective of filmmakers Will Stroud and Mike Manzoori.
programme.series-desc: Enjoy groundbreaking riding captured in the most desirable BMX spots in the world.

programme.title: +27: Social Innovators of South Africa
programme.desc: In the most violent township in South Africa, former pro basketball player and Red Bull Amaphiko Academy mentor Kita Thierry Matungulu is the director of Hoops4Hope, a foundation that teaches life skills by fostering a love for basketball.
programme.series-desc: A former pro basketball player uses his sport to teach life skills in South Africa's most violent township.

programme.title: Driving Dirty
programme.desc: With the start of the Baja 1000 just five days away, the teams are all in Ensenada, Mexico for the moment they've all been working toward. In the hours before the race starts something always goes wrong. Which teams can power through and overcome?
programme.series-desc: The teams head into Mexico ahead of race day with enough time for things to go wrong and no time to panic.

programme.title: Wingmen
programme.desc: Three of the world's best wingsuit flyers set out on a global journey in search of perfect spots for proximity flying and BASE jumps. From Brazil to China, the trio face some of the most thrilling and challenging flights of their lives.
programme.series-desc: Three elite BASE jumpers face the unknown on a global journey to find the best wingsuit and BASE jump spots.

programme.desc: Researcher and scientist Dr Dean Miller and his crew embark on a five-day expedition to document and study the reclusive Dwarf Minke whale, a rare creature that makes a brief annual appearance at Australia's Great Barrier Reef.
programme.series-desc: Dr Dean Miller and his research crew embark on a five-day expedition to study the elusive Dwarf Minke whale.

programme.title: Destination: Dirt
programme.desc: Meet three young and talented American racers as they are thrust into the international Rally Raid racing scene: Seth Quintero, Blade Hildebrand and Mitch Guthrie Jr.
programme.series-desc: Meet three talented young American racers as they are thrust into the Rally Raid racing scene.

programme.title: The White Maze
programme.desc: A pair of freeskiers embark on their own personal 'mission impossible' by attempting to ski the highest peak in Eastern Siberia. Matthias Haunholder and Matthias Mayr will push beyond their limits to conquer this mountain at the edge of the world.
programme.series-desc: It's 'mission impossible' for a pair of freeskiers who attempt to ski the highest peak in Eastern Siberia.

programme.title: Life Behind Bars
programme.desc: Armed with shovels and pup tents, Brandon Semenuk and his friends camp out in Lillooet, BC, Canada to tame the wild terrain into custom MTB trails. After scouting the zone and digging out dirt jumps and slopestyle lines, the guys test the new course.
programme.series-desc: Brandon Semenuk and his friends tame the wild terrain of Lillooet, BC, Canada into custom MTB trails.

programme.title: Life Behind Bars
programme.desc: In a former moto zone, Brandon Semenuk and buddy Graham Agassiz lead a crew to build a new run called the Snake Den. After scoping out the turf on motorbikes, the guys transform a terrain of dirt and fallen trees into a figure-eight MTB course.
programme.series-desc: In a former moto zone, Brandon Semenuk and Graham Agassiz lead a crew to build a new run called the Snake Den.

programme.title: Project Acheron: Patagonia
programme.desc: Explore the physical and spiritual challenges faced by four athletes trekking through the wild terrain of Patagonia. The individual athletes undergo a transformation as they gel with former Navy SEALs to become a strong team.
programme.series-desc: Four high performance athletes push their limits as they hike, kayak and climb through spectacular terrain.

programme.title: South to Sian
programme.desc: On boards, on bikes, by boat and four-wheel drive, Harrison Roach and Zye Norris’s journey is to discover if, in these days of GPS and WiFi, the dream of a true pioneering surf adventure is still possible.
programme.series-desc: Harrison Roach and Zye Norris set out to see if the dream of a true pioneering surf adventure is still alive.

programme.title: Drivin' Dirty with Bryce Menzies
programme.desc: Bryce helps teammate Jack get over his fear of heights by taking him indoor skydiving in Las Vegas. Upping the stakes, Bryce calls on the Red Bull Air Force to help them jump out of an actual plane. Will Jack be able to handle the pressure?
programme.series-desc: It's time for Bryce's team-mate Jack to get over his fear of heights – by indoor skydiving!

programme.title: Drivin' Dirty with Bryce Menzies
programme.desc: Bryce Menzies touches down in Spain to race rallycross at the Barcelona X Games. Before the race, the crew enjoys the Spanish culture and nightlife. When a storm rolls in and turns the course into a mud bog, Bryce wonders if he’ll get to race at all.
programme.series-desc: Bryce Menzies touches down in Spain to race rallycross at the Barcelona X Games.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: Follow two UCI World Cup rookies – 2017 cross-country U23 champion Kate Courtney and 2017 junior downhill champion Finn Iles – as they make the step up to elite-level racing. The pair quickly realise the benefits of hindsight and experience.
programme.series-desc: Follow UCI World Cup rookies Finn Iles and Kate Courtney as they make the step up to elite-level racing.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: As World Cup rookies Kate Courtney and Finn Iles prepare for their second pro events, hear from their rivals about what it takes to be the very best in a sport where consistency and confidence are key.
programme.series-desc: Hear from Kate Courtney and Finn Iles's rivals about what it takes to be the very best.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: From the juniors to the elites, winning is a matter of capturing an elusive blend of fitness and confidence. It’s easier said than done, especially come race day on World Cup track.
programme.series-desc: From the juniors to the elites, winning is a matter of capturing an elusive blend of fitness and confidence.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: Weather, injuries, and flat tyres, three variables that no amount of practice or training can control. As the riders prepare for the race at Mont-Sainte-Anne, Canada they reflect on the crazy and unpredictable events they've faced along the way.
programme.series-desc: The riders tirelessly prepare for the race at Mont-Sainte-Anne, Canada, but some variables are unavoidable.

programme.title: Higher Ground
programme.desc: Thomas de Dorlodot and Horacio Llorens journeyed for a personal adventure across the Himalayan mountains. They covered roughly 350km and became the very first paragliders to fly over Rohtang Pass.
programme.series-desc: Thomas de Dorlodot and Horacio Llorens journeyed for a personal adventure across the Himalayan mountains.

programme.title: All In
programme.desc: After both facing defeat in France, Kanoa Igarashi and Steph Gilmore put that behind them to continue the fight. Igarashi and Gilmore both move onward and upward at Meo Rip Curl Pro Portugal.
programme.series-desc: After both facing defeat in France, Kanoa Igarashi and Steph Gilmore move onward and upward in Portugal.

programme.title: All In
programme.desc: Steph Gilmore and Kanoa Igarashi prepare for the final events of their season on different Hawaiian islands. Will they each be able to finish strong?
programme.series-desc: Steph Gilmore and Kanoa Igarashi prepare for the final events of their season on different Hawaiian islands.

programme.title: Red Bull Defiance
programme.desc: A one-of-a-kind two-day event turns New Zealand's Wanaka region into the ultimate multi-sport race. Two-person teams run, cycle, and kayak through beautiful terrain, pushing their physical and mental limits in this endurance adventure race.
programme.series-desc: A one-of-a-kind two-day event turns New Zealand's Wanaka region into the ultimate multi-sport race.

programme.title: Break'n Reality
programme.desc: RoxRite returns to San Diego for his wedding, Jeskilz travels home to France for a competion, and Ronnie and the Jabbawockeez celebrate the premiere of their new show, Prisma, in Las Vegas.
programme.series-desc: RoxRite preps for his wedding day while Jeskilz travels home to France. Back in Vegas, Ronnie shares big news.

programme.title: Custom Forte
programme.desc: Pro driver Collete Davis has teamed up with Kia and Red Bull to build a one-of-a-kind race-spec 2019 Forte. The engine is pulled to make room for the Kia Stringer’s twin-turbo V6 motor, a six-speed sequential gearbox, custom wide body kit and more.
programme.series-desc: Collete Davis has teamed up with Kia and Red Bull to build a race-spec Forte. Watch the transformation begin.

programme.title: Custom Forte
programme.desc: Collete Davis checks in on the midway point of the transformation of a 2019 Kia Forte into a full-blown race car. The rear end suspension gets test fitted and the car finally gets taken for a spin on the track.
programme.series-desc: Collete Davis checks in on the midway point of the build.

programme.title: Custom Forte
programme.sub-title: Putting the car through its paces
programme.desc: Two months into the transformation of a 2019 Kia Forte into a full-blown race car, join pro driver Collete Davis and Red Bull Driftbrothers Elias and Joe as they put the custom build through its paces in Gräfenhainichen, Germany.
programme.series-desc: Join Collete Davis and the Red Bull Driftbrothers as they take the custom-built Kia Forte for a spin.

programme.title: Inspire the Night
programme.desc: Batekoo is the inclusive collective within Brazil which is focused on creating safe spaces for the LGBT and black communities through empowerment, equality and acceptance.
programme.series-desc: Batekoo is an inclusive collective that creates safe spaces for the LGBT and black communities in Brazil.

programme.title: Inspire the Night
programme.desc: House of Yes is a nightlife event in New York where everyone is made to feel welcome and where performers feel free to experiment with their self-expression. Get to know the House of Yes family and hear their stories.
programme.series-desc: House of Yes is a nightlife event in New York where freedom of self-expression is welcomed.

programme.title: Days of My Youth
programme.desc: The feeling of eternal youth that skiers get from doing what they love is the central theme of this two-year project from Matchstick Productions. Starring some of the most progressive skiers, this film shows the trials and triumphs of being the best.
programme.series-desc: Matchstick Productions' two-year project follows top skiers around the world chasing what they love: snow.
